Stopwatch.label: Stopwatch
Stopwatch.description: An ascending timer that counts how long time has passed since the timer was started after reset.

Cumulative_Time.label: Cumulative Time
Cumulative_Time.description: The total time in seconds that the stopwatch has been on. Writing a 0 resets the time.

On_Off.label: On/Off
On_Off.description: On/off control. Boolean value where True is On and False is Off.

Digital_Input_Counter.label: Digital Input Counter
Digital_Input_Counter.description: The number of times the input transitions from off to on.

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
